Plotting FunctionsÂ¶

The following graphical functions are included in graphics.py module.

graphics.plot_profiles Profiles of maximum in-plume vertical velocity and temperature
graphics.plot_conservedvars Conserved variable (dry static energy and concentration) plot
graphics.plot_zcl CWI smoke injection height estimation
graphics.plot_soundings Potential temperature soundings from LES runs
graphics.injection_model Model performance scatter plot using LES data
graphics.dimensionless_groups Dimensionless groups obtains through explicit solution
graphics.bias_correction Bias correction with LES data
graphics.model_sensitivity Cross-validation and model sensitivity analysis with LES
graphics.fuel_error Model error as a function of fuel category
